trait.name: Compression
entries: The octopus can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

reaction.name: Ink Cloud (1/Day)
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the octopus while underwater. {@actResponse} The octopus releases ink that fills a 5-foot {@variantrule Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube} centered on itself, and the octopus moves up to its {@variantrule Swim Speed|XPHB}. The {@variantrule Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube} is {@variantrule Heavily Obscured|XPHB} for 1 minute or until a strong current or similar effect disperses the ink.
